      • getIntFromUser

        public static int getIntFromUser(int minValue,
                                 int maxValue,
                                 java.lang.String errorMessage)
        helper method that gets an integer between minValue and maxValue from the user If the user enters anything other than an integer, catches the exception and prints the error message received from the method call
        Parameters:
        minValue - the minimum value of the menu
        maxValue - the maximum value of the menu
        errorMessage - the error message to display for an invalid entry
        Returns:
        the integer the user entered

        message - the error message to display
